title: I ni min pek hi a lo ral ta
lyrics:
I ni min pek hi a lo ral ta,
I thuin khua a thim Lalpa;
Biak hian kan mut lo tithianghlim la,
Thawh hunin fak i ngai fo va.

Nangma Kohhrante meng an awm fo,
Lei then tal eng lamah an hawi;
Chutin ven loh lai ren a awm lo,
Chhun zan zawmin i hming an sawi.

Khawmual leh thlliarkar indawt zelin,
Khawfing chat hian eng a hruai fo;
Tawngtai bang lovin a zui zel thin,
Fak hla ri hi a reh ngai lo.

Ni tla, mut hun tawk min hrilhtu hian,
Khawthlang lam unaute a tho;
Tin, tuifawn inchhawk ang awte chu,
Chawl lovin van lamah an chho.

A ni tak e, Lalpa, i ram hi,
Lei ram ang ral rual a ni lo;
Lo nghetin, a lo zau tur a nih
Thu, mi chungah lar chhuak hma rawh.
